channel.title: Stuck between rocks in c2a5b
channel.description:
I wanted to jump on the rocks on the left side of the minefield to avoid the mines and got stuck there :frowning:
bm_c2a5b setpos -2726.991699 3723.389404 569.100708;setang 15.233730 15.121484 -0.008337
EDIT: here's a reenactment of the terrible scene [youtu.be/ABGWSYHnoQ4](https://youtu.be/ABGWSYHnoQ4) ![20160606141229_1.jpg|690x500](upload://68YZBQ3h9SMzm31NupsncXbHzai.jpeg) ![20160606141231_1.jpg|690x500](upload://nX2v85lZJvf80PgbTF8mZ4wcr9x.jpeg)

item.title: Stuck between rocks in c2a5b
item.dc:creator: Agent6
item.description:
Crypt:

Don’t be silly, of course the developers will fix this. Good designers always fix ways that players could good stuck, and consider players doing stupid/odd things. Especially situations like this, where there’s no tricks or anything special involved, just running and jumping, an oversight on the devs part. There are countless other places like this that the devs have fixed up, even in that map, you just didn’t realize. They’ll add a plr clip and call it a day, 2 seconds. “Just try not to do that” could apply to anything, really.

You’re right, but I simply assumed that this was done on purpose, as the chapter was redone and it’s just like before in that particular zone. But I just remembered there are in fact some issues that are still not fixed in the chapter, so I guess I’m wrong.

But ,try not to do that, doesn’t really apply to everything, this was just a thought… didn’t think they overlooked details.

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck between rocks in c2a5b
item.dc:creator: Agent6
item.description:
But that is not a glitch, you simply fell in that small space and got stuck. You weren’t probably suppossed to do that.

Just try not to jump there, as there’s not enough space to get out. I doubt that the devs will make any adjustments honestly, as I think they expect the players to deal with the situation in a certain way (as you just grabbed a couple of grenades).

Read full topic
